title: MrBoobies
author: MrBoobies
content: What is Boobies Coin? Boobies coin is an ecosystem that will allow content creators to share their beauty with the world, and users of the platform will be able to use $BOOB to vote & purchase the art.Only Fans had a great idea when it started out, but letâ€™s face it.. it became nothing else but an amateur porn site. Boobies Ecosystem is differentâ€¦ We appreciate beautiful body & beautiful art. You donâ€™t have to strip naked to gain attention! We encourage content creators to share pictures, drawings, digital art etc. but nothing vulgar or inappropriate!Why Bobbie Coin? Anyone can join us in creating beautiful art. Maybe you have a beautiful body and want to share pictures? Maybe your drawing skills are extraordinary and you want to share your drawings? Maybe you are good with digital art? Maybe you know best prompts to create AI masterpieces? Everyone is welcome on our platform to share their content!How does it work?Content creators share their content on our platform and users can use $BOOB tokens to vote for your art or purchase it outright. Every week we will hold competitions where most liked content will be minted as NFT and sold on our platform!Why should you invest?Meme tokens are good, but they rely on hype to be successful. Unfortunately the hype eventually dies and tokens die along with it. Boobies token is the hype. It canâ€™t die. Boobies and appreciation of beautiful body was always around, from stone age up until now! Everyone loves Boobies! On a more practical side, we offer utility like nobody else. There are loads of porn sites out there, which are harmful and degrading. Boobies is different, we will not allow vulgarity. We only allow beauty!MarketersTake this opportunity to share and earn big!10% for every referral for as long as presale is live!!! ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥Connect your wallet to generate your own unique link that will pay 10% of each referred purchase for as long as presale is live! ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ NO INTERACTION BY THE TEAM, AFFILIATE BONUS GOES DIRECTLY TO THE WALLET YOU USED TO GENERATE LINK!!!Join our Telegram - https://t.me/+IdqgdrXT0rc1OTRkWebsite - https://boobiescoin.com/

comments.author: Beparanf

Boobies Ecosystem is differentâ€¦ We appreciate beautiful body & beautiful art. You donâ€™t have to strip naked to gain attention! This is cliche. OF and other same platform becomes popular because they have a lot of fresh faces of girls that doesnâ€™t available on the porn site which users can have a private access by just paying the fees.Lewd art is not that popular anymore because thereâ€™s already a lot of website that offers exclusivity to top quality girls that can offer nasty things for collection even panties if you get lucky. Iâ€™m just saying that your target market here is very small considering you are introducing into crypto peeps that usually prioritize earnings over lust.

comments.author: MrBoobies
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on October 15, 2023, 05:35:18 PMQuote from: MrBoobies on October 14, 2023, 12:50:42 PMOnly Fans had a great idea when it started out, but letâ€™s face it.. it became nothing else but an amateur porn site. Boobies Ecosystem is differentâ€¦ We appreciate beautiful body & beautiful art. You donâ€™t have to strip naked to gain attention! This is cliche. OF and other same platform becomes popular because they have a lot of fresh faces of girls that doesnâ€™t available on the porn site which users can have a private access by just paying the fees.Lewd art is not that popular anymore because thereâ€™s already a lot of website that offers exclusivity to top quality girls that can offer nasty things for collection even panties if you get lucky. Iâ€™m just saying that your target market here is very small considering you are introducing into crypto peeps that usually prioritize earnings over lust.Depends which way you look at it. OF started on similar merits and only after that grown into amateur porn / webcam site.That aside, if you look around, everything is over sexualised these days. And it is so for a reason - people get out of their houses less, less interactions with each other, more time spent at home in front of some sort of a screen.Yet while most people appreciate erotic elements of beauty, not everyone wants porn.Next, OF is now very much commercial, with same faces over and over again. New content creators are having very hard time to get out and be seen by people.So we will bring that freshness again for both, content creators & viewers alike.More & more people know about crypto and are looking for something after hearing all the crazy success stories. We will be aiming more at retail rather than hardcore crypto people in this case.And while our target market is retail, still for crypto guys, the utility behind the project will give enough green candles to keep them happy!

comments.author: MrBoobies
comments.body: One other things is that weâ€™ve actually spent quite some time looking at the market. And I have to disagree with your comment that there is no appetite for such project. Quite the opposite actually. Ever since lockdowns people spend more and more money on adult entertainment.
